tagline: The complete connection to skilled and unskilled workers, talented individuals and opportunities in all sectors across Namibia — all for you.

ourStory.title: Our Story
paragraphs: J-KIT was established out of a strong commitment to address Namibia’s pressing socio-economic challenges, including the high unemployment and poverty rates, the largely unregulated informal employment sector, and the limited opportunities available for Namibians to showcase and monetize their talents.

Founded by Kleopas H.T Malima, the platform was designed to connect workers and talents directly with employers and clients. We envisioned a platform that goes beyond simply listing jobs — one that actively empowers individuals, from domestic workers and skilled trades people to entertainers, to showcase their abilities, get hired, and secure work quickly.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To become Africa’s most trusted bridge between people and opportunity — empowering every individual, regardless of background, to earn, grow, and thrive by connecting talents and workers with income earning opportunities and who need them most.

mission.title: Our Mission
items: To bridge the gap between job seekers, talented individuals, and the people or businesses who need their skills and services using technology.
We believe everyone deserves access to opportunities that can change their lives, whether in the formal sector, informal sector, or creative industries.

problem.title: Problem Statement
items: High Unemployment: Namibia faces critical unemployment rates, especially among the youth, limiting economic progress.
Disorganized Informal Sector: A lack of structure makes it difficult and unsafe to find reliable work or workers.
Limited Visibility for Talent: Skilled individuals and creatives often struggle to connect with a broader audience and find paid gigs.
Safety and Trust Concerns: Without a verification system, both employers and job seekers face risks.

solution.title: Our Solution
items: Centralized & Verified Platform: We provide a single, secure online space for finding formal or informal jobs and opportunities for creative talent in Namibia.
Empowerment through Agents: We enable individuals and entities to act as agents, creating a vital connection point between workers, talents and their clients.
Increased Visibility & Opportunity: We give every individual (skilled or unskilled) a platform to showcase who they are, what they can do and connect with clients nationwide.

cta.title: Join Us in Changing Lives
cta.paragraph: Whether you’re hiring, looking for any type of job or you are showcasing your talent — J-KIT is all for you.
